sentences.en: A growing youth has a wolf in his belly.
sentences.cn: 年轻人,在成长,吃起饭来像饿狼.

sentences.en: A lot of the lads took small jobs to help keep the wolf from the door.
sentences.cn: 很多少年打零工帮补家里维持生计。

sentences.en: Both spouses had to take jobs in order to keep the wolf from the door.
sentences.cn: 为避免受饥寒之苦，夫妻俩不得不双双工作

sentences.en: He is a wolf in sheep's clothing, outwardly kind but inwardly vicious!
sentences.cn: 他是个披着羊皮的狼, 外貌仁慈,内心狠毒!

sentences.en: Her dancing brought loud cheers, wolf whistles and applause.
sentences.cn: 她的舞蹈赢来震耳的欢呼声、口哨声和掌声。

sentences.en: I work part-time to pay the mortgage and keep the wolf from the door.
sentences.cn: 我做兼职是为了偿还购房抵押贷款，还有免于挨饿。

sentences.en: She chained the wolf securely to the post.
sentences.cn: 她用铁链把那只狼锁在那根柱子上.

sentences.en: She has shot the wolf wounded.
sentences.cn: 她已经把那只狼打伤了.

sentences.en: She was fed up with the builders' wolf whistles each morning.
sentences.cn: 每天早上都有建筑工人冲她挑逗地吹口哨，她烦都烦死了。

sentences.en: The pups played with the mother wolf.
The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentences.cn: 这匹狼用爪子挠着树，嚎叫了整晚。

sentences.en: The wolf growled and bared its sharp fangs.
sentences.cn: 那匹狼吼叫着露出锋利的牙齿.

sentences.en: The wolf has a terror of fire.
The wolf padded through the forest.
sentences.cn: 那只狼慢慢地走过森林.

sentences.en: The wolf snapped at the hunter's hand.
The wolf was caught in a pitfall.
sentences.cn: 那只狼是利用陷阱捉到的.

sentences.en: They wolf-whistled at me, and I was so embarrassed I tripped up.
sentences.cn: 他们吹口哨挑逗我，我窘迫之下绊了一跤。

phrases.tran_cn: 披着羊皮的狼，伪装友善的敌人
大灰狼；苍狼（产于欧亚大陆和北美）

phrases.phrase: hold (或 have) a wolf by the ears
keep the wolf from the door

phrases.tran_cn: 免于穷困：为避免穷困和由于缺钱而造成的痛苦
独来独往的人；单独行动者
n. 大坏蛋；令人恐怖的人或事
弃某人于危险（或困境）而不顾
披着羊皮的狼：假装意气相投但实际上怀着恶毒意图的人

trans.tran_en: a wild animal that looks like a large dog and lives and hunts in groups
to eat something very quickly, swallowing it in big pieces
